nodes.text: Green Four was the call sign of the fourth member of Green Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Green Four.
During the evacuation of Hoth, Rebel pilot Nichos Panib used the call sign.

One year later, during the Battle of Endor, Rebel A-wing pilot Jake Farrell flew as Green Four, aiding Green Leader Arvel Crynyd in disabling the Executor and following Gold Leader Lando Calrissian and Red Leader Wedge Antilles into the second Death Star's superstructure.

Two and a half years after the Battle of Endor, New Republic Twi'lek pilot Nawara Ven used the call sign Green Four in a simulation of the Redemption scenario while training to qualify for membership in the reformed Rogue Squadron.
